game_description: A Realistic, Physics Based, Gun Simulator. Grab your gun with physical hands, and shoot bullets that are physically calibrated to real life. KEY FEATURES - Realism, everything feels just like real life, and guns have real world weight, and recoil - Gun Variety, over 100+ guns, scopes, attachments, and counting - Enemies, realistic enemies to shoot and fight - Wargame, fight over 20 AI in one map, surreal battlefield experience - Sniping, shoot at the longest 4Km VR sniper range ever

review_4: This game deserves 4 out of 5 stars imo I will list the pros and cons Pros -great customization for guns and vest layout -great graphics for quest -a ton of guns and attachments to choose from -great gun feel -a lot of pvp and single player maps -satisfying grenades and breaching tools -mg42 :) Cons -high grip sensitivity (if you have a sticky grip button that doesn't go out fully when you release the button irl 90% of the time your in-game character will keep hold of the item and you'll have to pull out the grip button irl to release in-game) -toxic community (pro tip gun them down) -only five attachments are allowed in multi-player) -multiplayer is slightly janky but its getting fixed -weapon sway is a bit too heavy making your character feel weak and your guns aren't very manageable (was reduced last update) Overall I recommend purchasing this on quest as a substitute for h3vr especially for the low 16$ price point.
